Macros

#define BSP_BOARD_INVALID_INST_ID   (0xFFU)
 Invalid instance ID.
 
#define BSP_DRV_ID_MISC_BASE   ((UInt32) 0x00002000)
 Driver ID for drivers other than video.
 
#define BSP_DRV_ID_UART   (BSP_DRV_ID_MISC_BASE + (UInt32) 0x00U)
 Driver ID for UART Driver.
 
#define BSP_DRV_ID_I2C   (BSP_DRV_ID_MISC_BASE + (UInt32) 0x10U)
 Driver ID for I2C Driver.
 
#define BSP_DRV_ID_MCSPI   (BSP_DRV_ID_MISC_BASE + (UInt32) 0x20U)
 Driver ID for MCSPI Driver.
 
#define BSP_DRV_ID_MCASP   (BSP_DRV_ID_MISC_BASE + (UInt32) 0x30U)
 Driver ID for MCASP Driver.
 
#define BSP_DRV_ID_ENET   (BSP_DRV_ID_MISC_BASE + (UInt32) 0x40U)
 Driver ID for Ethernet Driver.
 
#define BSP_DRV_ID_ENET_PHY_DP83865   (BSP_DRV_ID_MISC_BASE + (UInt32) 0x50U)
 Driver ID for Ethernet Phy DP83865 driver.
 
#define BSP_DRV_ID_MMC   (BSP_DRV_ID_MISC_BASE + (UInt32) 0x60U)
 Driver ID for MMC Driver.

Enumerations

enum  Bsp_BoardId {
  BSP_BOARD_UNKNOWN = 0x0001U, BSP_BOARD_VS = 0x0002U, BSP_BOARD_VC = 0x0004U, BSP_BOARD_VISION = 0x0008U,
  BSP_BOARD_VISION_TI81XX = 0x0010U, BSP_BOARD_CATALOG = 0x0020U, BSP_BOARD_CUSTOM = 0x0040U, BSP_BOARD_JAMR3 = 0x0080U,
  BSP_BOARD_MULTIDES = 0x0100U, BSP_BOARD_BASE_TDA2XX = 0x0200U, BSP_BOARD_BASE_TDA3XX = 0x0400U, BSP_BOARD_BASE_TI81XX = 0x0800U,
  BSP_BOARD_BASE_TDA2EX = 0x1000U, BSP_BOARD_MONSTERCAM = 0x2000U, BSP_BOARD_GP_AM572X = 0x4000U, BSP_BOARD_IDK_AM57XX = 0x8000U,
  BSP_BOARD_TDA3XX_RVP_ALPHA = 0x10000U, BSP_BOARD_TDA3XX_RVP_BETA = 0x20000U, BSP_BOARD_TDA3XX_RVP_A = 0x40000U, BSP_BOARD_TDA3XX_AR12XX_RADAR = 0x80000U,
  BSP_BOARD_TDA3XX_AR12XX_ALPS = 0x100000U, BSP_BOARD_BASE_TDA2PX = 0x200000U, BSP_BOARD_TDA2XX_CASCADE_RADAR = 0x400000U, BSP_BOARD_TDA2ECO_RVP_1 = 0x800000U,
  BSP_BOARD_TDA2ECO_RVP_AM571X_1 = 0x1000000U, BSP_BOARD_TDA2ECO_RVP_AM572X_1 = 0x2000000U, BSP_BOARD_TDA2ECO_RVP_TDA2X_1 = 0x4000000U, BSP_BOARD_TDA2XDE_RVP_X = 0x8000000U,
  BSP_BOARD_TDA3XX_D3_SK = 0x10000000U, BSP_BOARD_MAX = 0x7FFFFFFFU
}
 EVM Board ID. More...
 
enum  Bsp_BoardRev {

Detailed Description

This module defines APIs for board specific features.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum Bsp_BoardId

EVM Board ID.

Enumerator
BSP_BOARD_UNKNOWN 

Unknown board.

BSP_BOARD_VS 

Video survillance based board.

BSP_BOARD_VC 

Video conferencing based board.

BSP_BOARD_VISION 

Vision board of TDA2XX family.

BSP_BOARD_VISION_TI81XX 

Vision board of TI81XX family.

BSP_BOARD_CATALOG 

TVP7002/SIL1161A.

BSP_BOARD_CUSTOM 

Any other custom board.

BSP_BOARD_JAMR3 

JAMR3 board of TDA2XX family.

BSP_BOARD_MULTIDES 

Multi Deserializer board of TDA2XX family.

BSP_BOARD_BASE_TDA2XX 

TDA2XX Base Board.

BSP_BOARD_BASE_TDA3XX 

TDA3XX Base Board.

BSP_BOARD_BASE_TI81XX 

TI81XX Base Board.

BSP_BOARD_BASE_TDA2EX 

TDA2EX Base Board.

BSP_BOARD_MONSTERCAM 

TDA2XX XCAM.

BSP_BOARD_GP_AM572X 

AM572x GP EVM.

BSP_BOARD_IDK_AM57XX 

AM572x IDK EVM

BSP_BOARD_TDA3XX_RVP_ALPHA 

TDA3xx RVP Alpha board.

BSP_BOARD_TDA3XX_RVP_BETA 

TDA3xx RVP Beta board.

BSP_BOARD_TDA3XX_RVP_A 

TDA3xx RVP A board.

BSP_BOARD_TDA3XX_AR12XX_RADAR 

TDA3xx AR12xx Radar Board

BSP_BOARD_TDA3XX_AR12XX_ALPS 

TDA3xx AR12xx Radar Alps board

BSP_BOARD_BASE_TDA2PX 

TDA2PX Base Board.

BSP_BOARD_TDA2XX_CASCADE_RADAR 

TDA2XX Cascade Radar Board

BSP_BOARD_TDA2ECO_RVP_1 

TDA2ECO RVP Rev 1 board.

BSP_BOARD_TDA2ECO_RVP_AM571X_1 

TDA2ECO RVP (AM571X) Rev 1 board.

BSP_BOARD_TDA2ECO_RVP_AM572X_1 

TDA2ECO RVP (AM572X) Rev 1 board.

BSP_BOARD_TDA2ECO_RVP_TDA2X_1 

TDA2ECO RVP (TDA2X) Rev 1 board.

BSP_BOARD_TDA2XDE_RVP_X 

TDA2XDE RVP Rev 1/2/3/6 board.

BSP_BOARD_TDA3XX_D3_SK 

TDA3xx StarterKit board.

BSP_BOARD_MAX 

Max board ID.

enum Bsp_BoardMode

Device specific modes.

Enumerator
BSP_BOARD_MODE_DEFAULT 

This enum could be passed if the mode is a don't care and the mode select function returns success after selecting the default mode (if applicable).

BSP_BOARD_MODE_NONE 

Should be passed when board module is not required to be configured

BSP_BOARD_MODE_VIDEO_24BIT 

24-bit video mode.

BSP_BOARD_MODE_VIDEO_16BIT 

16-bit video mode.

BSP_BOARD_MODE_VIDEO_14BIT 

14-bit video mode.

BSP_BOARD_MODE_VIDEO_12BIT 

12-bit video mode.

BSP_BOARD_MODE_VIDEO_10BIT 

10-bit video mode.

BSP_BOARD_MODE_VIDEO_8BIT 

8-bit video mode.

BSP_BOARD_MODE_VIDEO_8BIT_TDM 

8-bit TDM (RGB interleaved) video mode.

BSP_BOARD_MODE_VIDEO_BT656 

8-bit BT656 video mode.

BSP_BOARD_MODE_VIDEO_BT1120 

16-bit BT1120 video mode.

BSP_BOARD_MODE_MAX 

Max board modes.

enum Bsp_BoardRev

Board revision ID.

Enumerator
BSP_BOARD_REV_UNKNOWN 

Unknown/unsupported board revision.

BSP_BOARD_REV_A 

Board revision A.

BSP_BOARD_REV_B 

Board revision B.

BSP_BOARD_REV_C 

Board revision C.

BSP_BOARD_REV_D 

Board revision D.

BSP_BOARD_REV_E 

Board revision E.

BSP_BOARD_REV_1P3A 

Board revision 1.3A

BSP_BOARD_REV_ALPHA 

Board revision Alpha.

BSP_BOARD_REV_BETA 

Board revision Beta.

BSP_BOARD_REV_A_4G 

Board revision A, 4G version.

BSP_BOARD_RADAR_DC_REV_1 

Board revision Direct Connection.

BSP_BOARD_REV_STARTER_KIT_REV_1 

Board revision 1, 2G Starter Kit

BSP_BOARD_REV_STARTER_KIT_REV_DASH 

Board revision -, 2G Starter Kit

BSP_BOARD_REV_1_4CH 

Board revision 1 4 channel baseboard.

BSP_BOARD_REV_1_8CH 

Board revision 1 8 channel baseboard.

BSP_BOARD_REV_2_8CH 

Board revision 2 8 channel baseboard.

BSP_BOARD_REV_DASH_4G 

Board revision 4G.

BSP_BOARD_REV_DASH_2G_STP 

Board revision 2G STP.

BSP_BOARD_REV_DASH_4G_STP 

Board revision 4G STP.

BSP_BOARD_REV_A_2G 

Board revision A 2G.

BSP_BOARD_REV_MAX 

Max board revision.

Function Documentation

Int32 Bsp_boardDeInit ( Ptr  args)

De-init the underlying platform.

Parameters
args[IN] Not used currently. Set to NULL.
Returns
BSP_SOK on success, else appropriate error code on failure.
Int32 Bsp_boardEnableTvp7002Filter ( UInt32  instId,
Fvid2_Standard  standard 
)

Enable the TVP7002 input filter.

Parameters
instId[IN] Instance ID. Used when multiple TVP7002 are present in a board.
standard[IN] Input standard to the filter.
Returns
BSP_SOK on success, else appropriate error code on failure.
Bsp_BoardRev Bsp_boardGetBaseBoardRev ( void  )

Returns the base board revision.

Returns
Base board revision information on success.
const Char* Bsp_boardGetBaseBoardRevString ( void  )

Function to get the name of the base board revision in printable string.

Returns
Returns a const pointer to the string. If the base board revision is not known, then it return the string as "UNKNOWN".
const Char* Bsp_boardGetBoardString ( void  )

Function to get the name of the board in printable string.

Returns
Returns a const pointer to the string. If the board is not known, then it return the string as "UNKNOWN".
Bsp_BoardRev Bsp_boardGetDcRev ( void  )

Returns the add-on or daughter card board revision.

Returns
Add-on or daughter card board revision information on success.
const Char* Bsp_boardGetDcRevString ( void  )

Function to get the name of the daughter card revision in printable string.

Returns
Returns a const pointer to the string. If the daughter card revision is not known, then it return the string as "UNKNOWN".
Bsp_BoardId Bsp_boardGetId ( void  )

Probes for video device and return board ID.

Returns
Board ID on success
UInt32 Bsp_boardGetVideoDeviceI2cAddr ( UInt32  devDrvId,
UInt32  drvId,
UInt32  drvInstId 
)

Returns the video device I2C address connected to the corresponding capture/display driver and instance.

Parameters
devDrvId[IN] Video device driver ID to get the info for.
drvId[IN] Driver ID to which the device is connected.
drvInstId[IN] Driver instance to which the device is connected.
Returns
I2C address of the device if found else returns 0.
UInt32 Bsp_boardGetVideoDeviceI2cInstId ( UInt32  devDrvId,
UInt32  drvId,
UInt32  drvInstId 
)

Returns the I2C instance to which the video device is connected corresponding capture/display driver and instance.

Parameters
devDrvId[IN] Video device driver ID to get the info for.
drvId[IN] Driver ID to which the device is connected.
drvInstId[IN] Driver instance to which the device is connected.
Returns
I2C instance if found else returns BSP_DEVICE_I2C_INST_ID_MAX.
UInt32 Bsp_boardGetVideoDeviceInstId ( UInt32  devDrvId,
UInt32  drvId,
UInt32  drvInstId 
)

Returns the device instance to which the video device is connected corresponding capture/display driver and instance.

Parameters
devDrvId[IN] Video device driver ID to get the info for.
drvId[IN] Driver ID to which the device is connected.
drvInstId[IN] Driver instance to which the device is connected.
Returns
Device instance if found else returns BSP_BOARD_INVALID_INST_ID.
Int32 Bsp_boardInit ( const Bsp_BoardInitParams *  initPrms)

Init the underlying board.

Parameters
initPrms[IN] Board Initialization parameters.
Returns
BSP_SOK on success, else appropriate error code on failure.
static UInt32 Bsp_boardIsTda2xxRvp ( void  )
inlinestatic

configures the pinmux of RVP with Radar.

Returns
TRUE if TDA2xx RVP, else FALSE.
Int32 Bsp_boardLateInit ( void  )

Handles any remaining init required after I2C is enabled.

Returns
BSP_SOK on success, else appropriate error code on failure.
Int32 Bsp_boardPowerOnDevice ( UInt32  devDrvId,
UInt32  instId,
UInt32  powerOn 
)

Perform Power On for the provided device through GPIO or I2C IO expander. If Power On is not needed this function returns success without reporting error.

Parameters
devDrvId[IN] Video device driver ID to power-on.
instId[IN] Instance ID. Used when multiple devices are present in a board.
powerOn[IN] TRUE - power on, FALSE - power down
Returns
BSP_SOK on success, else appropriate error code on failure.
Int32 Bsp_boardReadTCA6424BoardMux ( UInt32  numRegs,
UInt8  regVal[] 
)

This API is used for reading TCA6424 IO Mux value.

Parameters
numRegs[IN] Number of registers to read, at max 3
regVal[OUT]Variables in which values be read
Returns
BSP_SOK on success, else appropriate error code on failure.
Int32 Bsp_boardResetDevice ( UInt32  devDrvId,
UInt32  instId 
)

Perform reset for the provided device through GPIO or I2C IO expander. If reset is not needed this function returns success without reporting error.

Parameters
devDrvId[IN] Video device driver ID to reset.
instId[IN] Instance ID. Used when multiple devices are present in a board.
Returns
BSP_SOK on success, else appropriate error code on failure.
Int32 Bsp_boardSelectDevice ( UInt32  devDrvId,
UInt32  instId 
)

Enable board level mux for the provided device. If no muxing is needed this function returns success without reporting error.

Parameters
devDrvId[IN] Video device driver ID to select.
instId[IN] Instance ID. Used when multiple devices are present in a board.
Returns
BSP_SOK on success, else appropriate error code on failure.
Int32 Bsp_boardSelectMode ( UInt32  devDrvId,
UInt32  instId,
Bsp_BoardMode  boardMode 
)

Sets particular mode specific to the device.

Note: This API should be called only after calling power on and select device functions as calling the device select function after this could set the mode to default.

Parameters
devDrvId[IN] Video device driver ID to set the mode.
instId[IN] Instance ID. Used when multiple devices are present in a board.
boardMode[IN] Mode param.
Returns
BSP_SOK on success, else appropriate error code on failure. Note: This function returns BSP_SOK even if no mux programming is required for a particular mode of operation.
Int32 Bsp_boardSetPinMux ( UInt32  drvId,
UInt32  instId,
Bsp_BoardMode  boardMode 
)

This API is used for setting up the pinmux for the give interface and for the given instance of the driver.

Parameters
drvId[IN] Driver Id. Used to identify the driver
instId[IN] Instance ID. Used when multiple instances of the same device are present.
boardMode[IN] Board Mode. Based on this board mode, pinmux will be set, for example, for 8bit board mode, pinmuxe will be selected 8 data pins.
Returns
BSP_SOK on success, else appropriate error code on failure. Note: This function returns BSP_SOK even if no mux programming is required for a particular mode of operation.
Int32 Bsp_boardWriteTCA6424BoardMux ( UInt32  numRegs,
UInt8  regVal[] 
)

This API is used for writing TCA6424 IO Mux value.

Parameters
numRegs[IN] Number of registers to write, at max 3
regVal[OUT]Variables containig register values
Returns
BSP_SOK on success, else appropriate error code on failure.
static void BspBoardInitParams_init ( Bsp_BoardInitParams *  initPrms)
inlinestatic

Bsp_BoardInitParams structure init function.

Parameters
initPrms[IN] Pointer to Bsp_BoardInitParams structure.
